entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning late this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 14 April 2023
